iti112:0.3: The Chapter on the Holy Offering of the Teaching
iti112:1.1: This was said by the Buddha, the Perfected One: that is what I heard.
iti112:2.1: â€œMendicants, the world has been understood by a Realized One; and he is detached from the world.
iti112:2.2: The origin of the world has been understood by a Realized One; and he has given up the origin of the world.
